name: rito ⬩ dream
description:
Rito dream is a short colorful bullet-hell experience! Oppose your friend challenging you in danmaku duel who wants to change your mind about becoming immortal!


  • Randomized experience! The list of danmaku patterns and dialogue varies every attempt.
  • 3 game modes - great, good & bad luck that include different difficulty options.
  • a bit of dynamic difficulty.
  • 2 endings!

help me improve future games by sharing your opinion through comments or using this short form!

added txt with a bit of tips about moveset and endings

Controls:

  • move - arrows or wasd
  • shoot - press z or k
  • change shoot method - double z or k
